frontend.name: Personal Website
frontend.description: My Personal Website that was created using Flutter
achievements: Build a personal website using the Flutter framework,
Design the personal website to source data such as experiences and projects from AWS-S3

backend.name: ideaDog (server)
backend.description: IdeaDog is a social web application for sharing ideas.
achievements: Prototype a backend for a social media platform using Rust and the Actix framework
Design a system where users can post ideas, and vote up or down on other users ideas
Design the overall database structure using a combination of NoSQL and Graph to handle complex relationships.

backend.name: Holberton AirBnb clone
backend.description: This Airbnb clone project was create over six months in multiple iterations; which was designed to teach us how a web application is pieced together. Furthermore, help develop soft skills such as a collaboration through peer programming and shared Github repository as well as organization and documentation.
